name: Genius Puzzles
description:
Train your brain! Over 30 puzzles to tickle your neurons for hours of fun. Share your scores between iPhone and iPad via iCloud.

Genius Puzzler features:
- 30+ puzzles with multiple levels.
- Dynamically generated levels for unlimited challenges.
- Auto-solve feature if you just can’t figure it out.
- Auto saving of all of your games, so you never lose your progress
- iCloud support: Start a game in your iPhone, finish it using your iPad.
- Game Center support
